name: Dice Game (itch) (Neema Dreamcaster, heshiitou, Minion3665, Lavoie Studios)
name_original: Dice Game (itch) (Neema Dreamcaster, heshiitou, Minion3665, Lavoie Studios)
description:
To play the game you must roll your die to the exit tile. Some exit tiles require you to reach them with a certain number facing upward. Orientate your die correctly around the level to reach the end and progress!

Game Controls:
WASD - Move
Q & E - Rotate Camera

Created By:
Neema Dreamer
Heshiitou
Minion3665
Morgan
